accounts.description: Displays user account details like account number, balance, and transaction history.

apply for a new card.description: Allows users to apply for new debit or credit cards online by filling out a simple form.

apply for a car loan.description: Page to apply for a car loan; collects details like car type, loan amount, and tenure.

apply for educational loan.description: Used by students or parents to apply for education loans, including course and institution details.

apply for general insurance.description: Lets users purchase or apply for general insurance policies for property, health, or travel.

apply for home loan.description: Dedicated page for home loan applications; includes loan amount, property details, and EMI options.

apply for life insurance.description: For applying to life insurance plans with premium, policy term, and beneficiary details.

apply for personal loan.description: Handles personal loan applications, verifying user eligibility and loan requirements.

apply for block the card.description: Allows users to block their debit or credit card in case of loss or fraud instantly.

request for cheque book.description: Users can request a new cheque book by selecting account and delivery address.

see the credit card details.description: Displays userâ€™s existing credit card details, usage summary, and payment due information.

apply for fixed deposit.description: Enables users to open or manage Fixed Deposit accounts and calculate interest.

for purchasing the gold.description: Lets users buy or invest in digital gold with real-time price updates.

investments.description: Displays all user investments like mutual funds, fixed deposits, and recurring deposits.

loans.description: Summary of all user loans (car, home, personal) with EMI and repayment status.

mutual funds.description: Shows mutual fund plans, allows users to invest, redeem, or track NAV performance.

nominee update details.description: Allows users to update or add a nominee for their bank accounts or insurance policies.

payments.description: Central payment dashboard for transferring money, paying bills, and checking payment history.

services.description: General banking services such as card replacement, address change, or account upgrades.
